articles.title: Biden to take Covid-19 booster shot on camera amid criticism of his vaccine mandate - RT
articles.description: US President Joe Biden is about to get the Covid-19 booster shot and he’ll be doing so on TV, White House press secretary Jen Psaki told the media on Monday. Biden has been determined to get Americans to embrace the jab.
